summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5288 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks M and N, Bell's 5th Addition, being the alleys between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, from Battery Street to Vine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61147, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
